FILE: cm350630v11.0.txt
DYAD: GREECE - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV926
DISPUTE(S): MID2817 

PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180909
PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180909

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2817 

TERRMID: MID2817 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2817 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2817 from Gibler 2018, an Iranian mine damaged a Greek tanker in the Persian Gulf, after which a series of Iranian attacks on Greek vessels occurred. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. Iran mined the Persian Gulf and regularly attacked other countries' tankers to damage Iraqi export profits.

MARITMID: MID2817 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2817 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2817 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARLINK: MID2817 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2817 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2817 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2817 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
